sn56.37:1.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
sn56.37:1.2: In the same way, right view is the forerunner and precursor of truly comprehending the four noble truths.
sn56.37:1.3: A mendicant with right view can expect to truly understand:
sn56.37:1.4: ‘This is suffering’ … ‘This is the origin of suffering’ … ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ … ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.
sn56.37:2.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
